1338041656042532864.full_text:
#NeverForget Today marks the 83rd anniversary of the #NanjingMassacre & China’s 7th National Memorial Day for Nanjing Massacre Victims. 300,000 Chinese civilians and unarmed soldiers were killed by Japanese invaders over a six-week period.

Remember history, cherish peace🕯️ https://t.co/QS3FetgOCk

忘れない憎しみ！
